Vinska kraljica, ki je hotela biti poslanka, mora pred sodnike
Zoper Lidijo Mavretič in njenega moža je vložena obtožnica. Kot podjetnica in političarka ni prodrla, vozila je tudi taksi.
06 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Aleksander Brudar



Lidija Mavretič je letos začela voziti taksi. FOTO: Mediaspeed.net



Četudi je doma zrasla z vinom, ji na poslovnem področju pri tem ni šlo vse po načrtih. FOTO: Mediaspeed.net



Mavretičeva na fotografiji iz leta 1999. FOTO: Milovan Dimitrič



Našo južno mejo, čez reko Kolpo, poostreno varuje tudi slovenska policija. FOTO: PU Novo mesto



Policisti so prvo vinsko kraljico, njenega moža in Pakistanca prijeli v Sodražici. FOTO: Milan Glavonjić


LJUBLJANA – Priložnost dela tatu. Na ta znani slovenski rek so v začetku avgusta letos, ko je kot strela z jasnega udarila novica, da so policisti pri domnevnem tihotapljenju migrantov ujeli prvo vinsko kraljico Slovenije Lidijo Mavretič, njenega moža Marka Hraniloviča in še enega državljana Pakistana, najprej pomislili njeni nekdanji sokrajani.


Četudi je doma zrasla z vinom, ji na poslovnem področju pri tem ni šlo vse po načrtih. FOTO: Mediaspeed.net

Kot so takrat na veliko razlagali medijem, se v Beli krajini že nekaj časa šepeta, da marsikateri domačin migrantsko krizo izkorišča tudi za lasten zaslužek oziroma za izboljšanje finančnega položaja. Menda naj bi bili celo migranti tisti, ki se za tovrstno pomoč obračajo na domačine in jim za nekaj deset kilometrov vožnje ponujajo vse tja do petsto evrov.Ali so Mavretičevo, ki sicer prihaja iz Bele krajine, v zadnjih letih pa skupaj z možem živi v kraju Jezero pri Podpeči, migranti na tak način povezali z njeno rodno pokrajino, seveda ve le ona. Oziroma bo, kot vse kaže, o tem moralo reči zadnjo sodišče, če bo obtožnica seveda postala pravnomočna. Kot nam je namreč potrdila dr. Katarina Bergant, vodja ljubljanskega okrožnega tožilstva, je bila zoper vse tri 21. 10. 2019, »vložena obtožnica po preiskavi«.


Našo južno mejo, čez reko Kolpo, poostreno varuje tudi slovenska policija. FOTO: PU Novo mesto

Policisti so trojico prijeli konec julija v Sodražici zaradi suma prevoza in organizacije prevoza tujcev oziroma storitve kaznivega dejanja prepovedanega prehajanja meje ali ozemlja države. V času prijetja naj bi Mavretičevi že uspelo izpustiti tujce, Hranilovič pa naj bi bil ujet skupaj z njimi. Čez našo mejo na zahod naj bi tako pomagala sedmim pakistanskim državljanom.Menda naj bi bilo v vse skupaj vpletenih še nekaj drugih posameznikov, ki naj bi poskrbeli za duplikate ključev ob panelni ograji ob Kolpi in tako migrantom na zelo sodoben način, in sicer s pomočjo telefonskih sporočil in koordinat, sporočali, kje točno jih lahko najdejo. 
Želela je postati poslanka


Mavretičeva na fotografiji iz leta 1999. FOTO: Milovan Dimitrič

O Mavretičevi je bilo mogoče od konca leta 1995, ko je bila okronana za prvo slovensko vinsko kraljico, veliko slišati. Njeni starši, ki živijo v belokranjskih Vidošičih in ki so bili ob novici o njeni aretaciji zelo presenečeni, so dogajanje komentirali z besedami, da če je res storila kaznivo dejanje, naj za to tudi odgovarja. Vinska kraljica je sicer postala, ko je bila stara 18 let in je bila dijakinja četrtega letnika Srednje kmetijske šole Grm pri Novem mestu.V naslednjih letih se je na vse pretege trudila, da bi s svojim vinskim znanjem postala uspešna podjetnica. Deset let po razglasitvi za kraljico smo v Novicah pisali, da se je nekaj časa ne preveč uspešno trudila z marketingom dolenjsko-belokranjskega projekta Po poteh dediščine, na evropskih volitvah leta 2004, na katerih je zastopala barve takrat še Združene liste socialnih demokratov oziroma današnjih Socialnih demokratov, pa se ji ni uspelo zriniti v evropske poslanske klopi.Ko pride ponudba, za katero zaslutiš še vseslovensko zanimanje, se pač odzoveš.V stranki so avgusta letos poudarili, da Mavretičeva ni članica njihove stranke in da v njej ni bila aktivna od leta 2004, so se pa njihovi funkcionarji srečevali z njo, ko je opravljala funkcijo vinske kraljice. 
Leto končala z izgubo
Prva vinska kraljica ni bila preveč uspešna niti v gostinskih vodah. Njen lokal, kot smo pisali leta 2005, v bršljinskem predelu Novega mesta ni prav dolgo deloval, čeprav je nosil ime znamenite igralke Marilyn Monroe, je pa leta 2006 ob neki priložnosti za Delo odkrito povedala, da je v Nemčiji vinska kraljica promocijsko veliko bolj izkoriščena kot pri nas: »Ko pride ponudba, za katero zaslutiš še vseslovensko zanimanje, se pač odzoveš. Z našimi vini bi se dalo narediti in iztržiti še precej več. Tu mej pravzaprav ni.«Čez deset let je skupaj s tremi vinskimi kraljicami stopila na skupno poslovno pot; ustanovile so podjetje in registrirale novo blagovno znamko Kraljica. A niti v tej zgodbi, kot vse kaže, za Mavretičevo ni bilo velikega uspeha, saj naj bi se letos začela preživljati z vožnjo taksija po Ljubljani. Iz vpogleda v javnodostopne podatke Agencija Republike Slovenije za javnopravne evidence in storitve (Ajpes) ima sicer od 9. novembra 2001 odprt s. p. s polnim imenom Poslovno svetovanje, Lidija Mavretič, s. p., pri čemer pa ima od 24. oktobra letos spet blokiran poslovni račun.
1. vinska kraljica je Lidija Mavretič.
»Evidentirano pomanjkanje sredstev na računu imetnika za poplačilo njegove obveznosti,« sporočajo z Ajpesa. Leta 2018 je prikazala le za 4219 evrov prihodkov, leto pa je končala z izgubo v višini 3269,03 evra.

The wine queen who wanted to be an MP must go before the judges
An indictment has been filed against Lidija Mavretic and her husband. As an entrepreneur and politician, she did not penetrate, she also drove a taxi.
06 Nov 2019, 05:45 by Aleksander Brudar



Lidija Mavretic started driving a taxi this year. PHOTO: Mediaspeed.net



Even though she grew up with wine at home, her business was not going as planned. PHOTO: Mediaspeed.net



Photo by Milav Dimitric



Our southern border, across the Kolpa River, is also being tightly guarded by Slovenian police. PHOTO: PU Novo mesto



Police officers apprehended the first wine queen, her husband and a Pakistani woman in Sodražica. PHOTO: Milan Glavonjic


LJUBLJANA - Opportunity to work as a thief. This famous Slovenian river was struck in the beginning of August this year by the news that police allegedly captured the first wine queen of Slovenia, Lidija Mavretic, her husband Marko Hranilovic and another Pakistani citizen in alleged smuggling of migrants. .


Even though she grew up with wine at home, her business was not going as planned. PHOTO: Mediaspeed.net

As it was widely interpreted to the media at the time, it has been rumored in Bela Krajina for some time that many locals are also exploiting the migrant crisis for their own profit or for improving their financial situation. Even migrants are supposed to be the ones who turn to the locals for this kind of help and offer them up to five hundred euros for a few tens of miles. the place Jezero pri Podpeči, migrants in this way connected with its native land, of course only she knows. Or, as it seems, the last court will have to say so if the indictment becomes final. Namely, as dr. Katarina Bergant, head of the Ljubljana District Attorney's Office, was charged with all three on October 21, 2019, "following an investigation."


Our southern border, across the Kolpa River, is also being tightly guarded by Slovenian police. PHOTO: PU Novo mesto

The police arrested three of them at the end of July in Sodražica on suspicion of transporting and organizing the transport of aliens or committing the criminal offense of forbidden crossing the border or territory of the country. At the time of the arrest, Mavretic had already managed to release the aliens, and Hranilovic had been arrested with them. Seven Pakistani citizens are expected to help across the border to the west. There are allegedly several other individuals involved, who are supposed to provide duplicate keys at the Kolpa panel fence and so migrants in a very modern way, with the help of telephone messages and coordinates, telling them exactly where to find them.
She wanted to become a Member


Photo by Milav Dimitric

A lot has been heard about Mavretic since the end of 1995, when she was crowned the first Slovenian wine queen. Her parents, who live in Vidosici in Bela krajina and who were very surprised by the news of her arrest, commented on the incident, saying that if she did commit a crime, she should also be held responsible. She became a wine queen when she was 18 years old and a fourth-year student at the Grm Secondary School of Agriculture in Novo mesto. In the following years she tried to become a successful entrepreneur with her wine skills. Ten years after the proclamation of the Queen, we wrote in the News that for some time she had not worked too successfully with the marketing of the Dolenjska-Belokranjska project On Heritage Trails, in the 2004 European elections, in which she represented the colors of the then United List of Social Democrats, or the Social Democrats, however, did not manage to join the European parliamentary seats. When the offer, for which you still have an interest in Slovenia, comes, you respond. The party said in August this year that Mavretic has not been a member of their party and has not been active in it since. In 2004, however, their officials met her as a wine queen.
Ended the year with a loss
The first wine queen was not too successful even in the hospitality waters. Her pub, as we wrote in 2005, did not work long in the ivy area of Novo mesto, although it bore the name of the famous actress Marilyn Monroe, but in 2006, on one occasion, to Delo she openly stated that the wine queen in Germany was much more exploited as in ours: “When an offer comes in, and you feel interest in it all over, you respond. With our wines, much more could be done and made. There are really no boundaries here. ”Ten years later, she and three wine queens embarked on a joint business journey; they founded the company and registered the new Queen brand. But even in this story, as it seems, it was not a great success for Mavretič, as she is expected to start living this year by driving a taxi across Ljubljana.
